name: 萨那的城墙
writer: 皮埃尔·保罗·帕索里尼 Pier Paolo Pasolini
actor: 皮埃尔·保罗·帕索里尼 Pier Paolo Pasolini
summary: Pasolini's documentary is an appeal to UNESCO to save the destruction of a beautiful Yemen's ancient town of Sana'a. The old, fortified city has been inhabited for more than 2500 years and contains a wealth of intact architectural gems. It was declared a World Heritage City by the United Nations in 1984.
